youMustBeAccountOwnerTitle: You must be an account owner to use this service Welsh
onlyAccountOwnersForAuthAgent: Only account owners for the authorised agent can update the agent's details or close the account. Welsh
youllNeedToContactAccountOwner: You'll need to contact an account owner and ask them to use the service. Or, you can ask them to change your role to make you an account owner. Welsh
toViewTheAccountOwners: to view the account owners for {BUSINESS_NAME}. Welsh
